page.title: 06MARYKIRK SCHOOL YEAR EVENTS
page.content: During the school year the pupils have been involved in many activities. Primary 5,6 and 7 visited The Retreat Folk Museum in Glen Esk. A Hallowe'en sponsored disco in aid of the Ethiopian Famine Appeal was held in the G.P. Room. Before Christmas all pupils travelled to Aberdeen to see the pantomine,"Aladdin". At Christmas, an afternoon party was held in the G.P.Room. In February, the Seniors went to see Mozart's opera, "The Magic Flute". On June 4th, the seniors visited an Episcopal Church in Brechin, an Islamic Centre, a Sikh Temple and a Synagogue in Dundee as part of their religious education work. On June 7th, the juniors visited Camperdown Park in Dundee for the day. At the end of the summer term the school sports were held in Marykirk Park.
